article_title: Cities and towns a patchwork of e-cigarette restrictions

article_metadata.author: Christian M. Wade  Statehouse Reporter

og.description: BOSTON — Public health officials in cities and towns are adopting tough rules on the sale and use of electronic cigarettes, even as the state considers banning their sale to
